verses.verse: Then He said <WH559> to me, "Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> stand <WH5975> on your feet <WH7272> that I may speak <WH1696> with you!"
And as He spoke <WH1696> to me the Spirit <WH7307> entered <WH935> me and set <WH5975> me on my feet; <WH7272> and I heard <WH8085> [Him] speaking <WH1696> to me.

Then He said <WH559> to me, "Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> I am sending <WH7971> you to the sons <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> to a rebellious <WH4775> people <WH1471> who <WH834> have rebelled <WH4775> against Me; they and their fathers have transgressed <WH1> against Me to this <WH6586> very <WH2088> day. <WH6106>

"And I am sending <WH7971> you to them who are stubborn <WH7186> <WH6440> and obstinate <WH2389> <WH3820> children; <WH1121> and you shall say <WH559> to them, 'Thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God. <WH3068>'

"As for them, whether <WH518> they listen <WH8085> or <WH518> not – for they are a rebellious <WH4805> house <WH1004> – they will know <WH3045> that a prophet <WH5030> has been <WH1961> among <WH8432> them.

"And you, son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> neither <WH408> fear <WH3372> them nor <WH408> fear <WH3372> their words, <WH1697> though <WH3588> thistles <WH5621> and thorns <WH5544> are with you and you sit <WH3427> on scorpions; <WH6137> neither <WH408> fear <WH3372> their words <WH1697> nor <WH408> be dismayed <WH2865> at their presence, <WH6440> for they are a rebellious <WH4805> house. <WH1004>
"But you shall speak <WH1696> My words <WH1697> to them whether <WH518> they listen <WH8085> or <WH518> not, for they are rebellious. <WH4805>

"Now you, son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> listen <WH8085> to what <WH834> I am speaking <WH1696> to you; do not be rebellious <WH4805> like that rebellious <WH4805> house. <WH1004> Open <WH6475> your mouth <WH6310> and eat <WH398> what <WH834> I am giving <WH5414> you."
Then I looked, <WH7200> behold, <WH2009> a hand <WH3027> was extended <WH7971> to me; and lo, <WH2009> a scroll <WH4039> <WH5612> [was] in it.

When He spread <WH6566> it out before <WH6440> me, it was written <WH3789> on the front <WH6440> and back; <WH268> and written <WH3789> on it were lamentations, <WH7015> mourning <WH1899> and woe. <WH1958>
